creator: ACINQ
descriptionHtml:
Phoenix is a next-generation Bitcoin wallet that lets you send and receive Bitcoin easily.

Phoenix natively supports Lightning for fast and cheap transactions.
descriptionShort: Send and receive Bitcoin instantly and keep control of your coins.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Add support for LNURL-auth
- Add support for custom fee rate when paying on-chain address
- Opt-in SSL for Electrum when using Tor

title: Phoenix | The Bitcoin wallet from the future

creator: ACINQ
descriptionHtml:
Phoenix is a next-generation Bitcoin wallet that lets you send and receive Bitcoin easily.

Phoenix natively supports Lightning for fast and cheap transactions.
descriptionShort: Send and receive Bitcoin instantly and keep control of your coins.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- The app can now receive payments in background
- Channels are now automatically created when needed
- Can now set a default description for generated invoices
- Added more information in the payment details screen
- Added mempool.space on-chain explorer
- Many improvement and fixes

title: Phoenix | The Bitcoin wallet from the future

creator: ACINQ
descriptionHtml:
Phoenix is a next-generation Bitcoin wallet that lets you send and receive Bitcoin easily.

Phoenix natively supports Lightning for fast and cheap transactions. It's easy, you don't have to do anything: Lightning channels are automatically created by the wallet when needed and you can check their status on Bitcoin explorers.

Phoenix is also self-custodial: you (and only you) have control of the key of the wallet. Backup the key and make sure to keep it safe!
descriptionShort: Send and receive Bitcoin instantly and keep control of your coins.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Fix a compatibility issue where payments received from LND 0.15.1-beta nodes would fail.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Add 🇩🇪 German, 🇪🇸 Spanish, 🇵🇹 Portuguese and 🇨🇿 Czech localisation. Thanks myxmaster for the help!
- Handle callback actions for LNURL payments
- Display LN address in payment details when available
- Added warnings regarding legacy on-chain address usage. Contact support if you accidentally use them after the migration.

descriptionShort: Send and receive Bitcoin instantly and keep control of your coins.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Fixed an issue that could cause outgoing payments to stay "pending" in the UI, although they did fail, which typically affected hodl invoices payments.
- Fixed an issue where metadata were not stored correctly, affecting messages or link for LNURL payments, as well as fiat conversion.

title:
Phoenix - LN Bitcoin wallet
2.5.1

creator: ACINQ
descriptionHtml:
Phoenix is a next-generation Bitcoin wallet that lets you send and receive Bitcoin easily.

Phoenix natively supports Lightning for fast and cheap transactions. It's easy, you don't have to do anything: Lightning channels are automatically created by the wallet when needed and you can check their status on Bitcoin explorers.

Phoenix is also self-custodial: you (and only you) have control of the key of the wallet. Backup the key, and make sure to keep it safe!
descriptionShort: Send and receive Bitcoin instantly and keep control of your coins.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - Fixed a crash with the scanner on some devices, as well as several issues that could affect the stability of the app.

title:
Phoenix - LN Bitcoin wallet
2.5.2

creator: ACINQ
descriptionHtml:
Phoenix is a next-generation Bitcoin wallet that lets you send and receive Bitcoin easily.

Phoenix natively supports Lightning for fast and cheap transactions. It's easy, you don't have to do anything: Lightning channels are automatically created by the wallet when needed and you can check their status on Bitcoin explorers.

Phoenix is also self-custodial: you (and only you) have control of the key of the wallet. Backup the key, and make sure to keep it safe!
descriptionShort: Send and receive Bitcoin instantly and keep control of your coins.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Bolt12 offers can now be generated at will and customised with a description and amount.
- Added a button to export the payments database. These payments can then be imported when restoring the seed on another device.
- Contacts can now have a Lightning address and multiple offers attached.
- Several fixes and improvements

title:
Phoenix - LN Bitcoin wallet
2.6.0
